byline.contributor: Scott Cacciola contributed reporting from New Orleans.

abstract: Former NBA player Andrew Lang has stayed close to game after retirement by becoming chaplain for Atlanta Hawks, leading prayers before each home game; every NBA team has volunteer chaplain who invites players from both sides to pray before games and many players see sessions as regular part of pregame ritual.
lead_paragraph: There are critics of N.B.A. teams’ pregame chapel services, but many people in the league have made the practice an essential part of their pregame ritual.

headline.main: N.B.A. Pregame Routine: Stretch. Tape Ankles. Join Hands in Prayer.
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Pregame Routine: Stretch. Tape Ankles. Join Hands in Prayer.

snippet: There are critics of N.B.A. teams’ pregame chapel services, but many people in the league have made the practice an essential part of their pregame ritual.
